episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and intriguing topics, including the transmission of diseases from parrots, the security measures taken by the head of the AA to protect car keys, the creation of a human-hamster hybrid for scientific testing, and the surprising value of cardboard on the black market.

facts.fact: You can catch chlamydia from dead parrots.
The head of the AA keeps his car keys in the microwave.
Scientists have successfully made a human hamster hybrid.
Cardboard is so valuable on the black market that it is nicknamed beige gold.
